title: (x) John Legend "Once Again" album cover type - House Chalet {Stephen}
content:
I was wonder what this type face is. It kinda reminds me of Chalet.

[http://cover6.cduniverse.com/MuzeAudioArt/Large/46/943246.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092553/http:/cover6.cduniverse.com/MuzeAudioArt/Large/46/943246.jpg "http://cover6.cduniverse.com/MuzeAudioArt/Large/46/943246.jpg")

Thanks, Donny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092553im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/943246_4706.jpg)

 [‹ BABY TEETH](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/2547 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Commons at Pierpont spiky straight-sided face - Shogun {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092553/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30400 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typevolcom

comments.content: I think it’s just a slight modification (’e’) of [Chalet London 1970](http://web.archive.org/web/20080924092553/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts).
